reviewText: Not as much help as i hoped for, it is good to get some help, but i hoped for more.

This was an excellent video. It lets you know that you are OK if you like BDSM (some of it) and you can use it to spice up your sexual pleasure! I really enjoyed being instructed by the Mistress in the video and enjoyed watching REAL couples perform; not some porno movie. Would recommend to anyone who would like to explore beyond vanilla sex!
I was looking for a how to for beginners. This was a low budget porno. They didn't really show or explain what to do.

What a waste of time and money!  The "hosts" seemed uncomfortable and the "mistress" explaining bondage was annoying in the extreme.  There was nothing really instructional or even intriguing.  How someone could make a video about "kinky sex" and make it boring is beyond me.  Simply dreadful!

I guess if you want heavy bondage or pain you would not like this DVD, but we found the playful attitude and helpful information quite appealing.  For couples wanting to experiment and explore something a little different without going to extremes, I would highly recommend.

This is a good DVD for couples looking to explore - I would rate it a good balance between information, instruction, and sex.  Several couples demonstrate different techniques and talk about their reactions to a mild form of pain as pleasure. One segment includes a visit to a dominatrix and her "dungeon" which is very informative, and quite titillating when a husband and wife decide to experiment. All done tastefully in my opinion.

My husband and I were so looking forward to some beginner BDSM, we were so disappointed they seemed laugh acted silly no real instruction were given, we have played more then they have. Was more like very bad porn.
